snippet.title: Poptropica: A fun and safe virtual world for kids!
snippet.description:
Welcome to Poptropica! This awesome video gives you a look into the free and fun virtual world that kids all over the globe love!

-- HOW TO PLAY
Play Poptropica online: http://www.poptropica.com
Get our app: http://www.poptropica.com/apps/poptropica.html
Get extra benefits with membership: https://www.poptropica.com/store/buy-membership.html

-- ABOUT POPTROPICA
Explore a chain of Islands, travel back in time, battle monsters, solve mysteries, and complete many quests in Poptropica®, a virtual world created by Jeff Kinney, author of the Diary of a Wimpy Kid book series! 

Play for FREE! Make friends and chat with them, create cool costumes for your Poptropican, and compete in fun games with other Poptropicans -- all in a safe online environment.

Since its 2007 launch, Poptropica’s story-based Islands have been explored more than one billion times! WOW!

-- SUBSCRIBE TO OUR YOUTUBE CHANNEL
Access Poptropica walkthroughs that help you through Islands, see behind-the-scenes videos, and be the first to know about anything new on Poptropica!

Subscribe here: https://www.youtube.com/c/poptropica

-- FOLLOW POPTROPICA ON SOCIAL MEDIA
Instagram: https://instagram.com/poptropicacreators/
Snapchat: https://www.snapchat.com/add/PoptropicaSC
Twitter: https://twitter.com/poptropica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialPoptropica/
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+poptropica
Tumblr: http://poptropicacreators.tumblr.com/
Vine: https://vine.co/u/1119340455163990016
